courseDescription:
The law of attraction is based on the belief that thoughts are a form of energy and positive energy attracts success in all areas of life, such as health, finances, and relationships. This free online course will introduce you to the law of attraction. You will gain a deeper understanding of how the law of attraction works in your life. This will enable you to live the life you choose with more financial freedom, better relationships, and vibrant health. Learn and practice several powerful and practical tools that will enable you to create all that you dream and desire when applied correctly. You will study a step-by-step process to show you the tools and techniques to get the law of attraction to work for you rather than against you decisively. Familiarize yourself with self-hypnosis to reprogram your subconscious mind with the latest neuroscience principles and create your unique empowering affirmation. Discover the hidden thought patterns missing from your subconscious mind. Use one of the most straightforward tools for relaxation and meditation to unwind and release any tension you may have in your body or mind.

Discover several powerful processes and tools to access your subconscious mind and change its limited programming. Find out how the law of attraction works with your thoughts and feelings to create your reality and how connecting with the subconscious mind is so valuable for changing your limiting thoughts and beliefs. You will learn a powerful self-hypnosis technique called the Yoga Nidra, enabling you to connect with your subconscious mind. How to create a master list of all your big dreams, desires, and power affirmation will also be discussed. Have you ever used affirmations and still did not get the desired results? This process of self-hypnosis and affirmation will help you solve that problem. Learn how changing your limiting beliefs exercise will help you transform any limiting beliefs you may have. Learn how to replace them with positive empowering beliefs. Uncover how our thoughts and beliefs affect our health and well-being through the science of neuroplasticity and find out some tips to help you feel good. Study some brainwave patterns such as beta and alpha and learn why we form most of our subconscious mind patterns and beliefs in our early years.

This is a practical course with all the tools you need to succeed with the law of attraction. Have you wondered why you work so hard to make your life work, but you can't make that breakthrough? This course also covers how to eliminate your toxic beliefs so that you can live the life of your dreams. Most popular books or programs on self-improvement only touch the surface of your challenges, not the subconscious toxic beliefs. You will get clear simple to follow steps to manifest more money, vibrant health, and loving relationships in your life. This course is suitable for anybody who would like to replace negative thinking and beliefs with positive empowering thoughts and ideas. No prior knowledge or experience is necessary, but it requires you to have an open mind and enthusiasm to learn. You will also need to be willing to complete practical exercises and have a genuine desire to change your life. Enrol today and begin your transformation.
